name: Leonid Mendelevich Levin
vita: Honored Architect of the Republic of Belarus.
timeline1: Studying at the Belarusian Polytechnic Institute.
timeline2: Work at the Minskproject Institute (from the architect to the head of the Minsk Construction Center Workshop).
timeline3: Participation in the creation of the park. 50th anniversary of Soviet power.
timeline4: Participation in the creation of the exhibition pavilion VDNH BSSR in Minsk.
timeline5: As part of the group of authors, he was awarded the Lenin Prize for the memorial complex of 1968-1969. Khatyn.
